title: Night Medium

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target will become able to talk to the dead for the rest of the game.
- Your target will also no longer be able to use abilities, vote, whisper, or speak in day chats, and their role and last will will be revealed, and they won't count towards majority or be a legal target for votes, whispers, or abilities for the rest of the game.
- You may only séance someone once.
- You may talk to the alive while dead.
